name: Tori (itch) (AveragePerson22)
description:
Controls:

WASD for moving

SPACE for dodging a really close bullet

Left Mouse Click on an enemy within reach to kill it

In this game you try to run as far as possible, while performing extended jumps (jump when hitting the ground) and killing enemies for points. If an enemy relese orange smoke it is about to shoot at you. Tori, your companion magic parrot, follows you and kills enemies for you in between resting. You know he is active when he shines.
